title: Critical problem in Torch.add function
body_html:
We have found critical issue in torch.add(x,y) function. It seems broadcasting feature does not work well for special case:

import torch
x = torch.Tensor(1, 16, 32, 64, 64)
y = torch.Tensor(16, 1, 32 ,64 ,64)
z = torch.add(x,y)

The size of z should be [1, 16, 32, 64, 64] but it is [16, 16, 32, 64, 64]? WHY?
Whatever number instead of 1 works well? Any idea?
